mapper.select: SELECT com.t_commodity_id commodityId , com.gt_id gtId, com.c_goods_sn goodsSn, com.c_name 'name', com.c_counter_price counterPrice, com.c_retail_price retailPrice, com.c_is_hot isHot, com.c_is_new isNew, com.c_is_on_sale isOnSale, com.c_keywords keywords, com.c_unit unit, com.c_brief brief, com.c_number 'number', pic.pic_url picUrl, pic.pic_type picType FROM t_commodity com LEFT JOIN t_pic pic ON com.c_goods_sn=pic.c_goods_sn WHERE com.c_goods_sn = #{id}
